body: //section[@id="default-list-item"]/div[(contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' article '))]
#title: //h1[@class='title']
title: //div[@class='second-title']
author: //section[@id="default-list-item"]/div[@class="authors-block"]//a
strip: //div[@class='second-title']

strip_id_or_class: page__subscribe-news
strip_id_or_class: news-subscribe
strip_id_or_class: advertising
strip_id_or_class: subscribe-block
strip_id_or_class: audio
